author: Mirror Football
title: Pick YOUR Liverpool XI for trip to Old Trafford for crucial match against Manchester United

organizations.name: manchester united sport pick your liverpool xi

text:
Sport Pick YOUR Liverpool XI for trip to Old Trafford for crucial match against Manchester United   matches in club football - but who would you pick if you had control of the team?   Klopp's shoes? (Photo: Liverpool FC via Getty)   
Liverpool travel to Manchester United for the biggest game of their season this weekend. 
Win and they are right back in the title race, putting further pressure on Chelsea. 
Lose and, well, United move to within two points of the Reds and suddenly hopes of finishing in the top four are put in jeopardy. 
It means that Jurgen Klopp's team selection for the game has never been more important. 
But who would you pick if you were able to stand in Klopp's shoes? 
  your starting XI. Like us on Facebook
